CVSD schools are now closed for the rest of this school year.
CVSD continues to monitor information about COVID-19 (a type of coronavirus). Check back for updates.

h3.a: FREE Meals for Kids (Updated 4/9/20) - Second Harvest Mobile Market Added

div.div:
Kids, age 18 and under, can enjoy a free, nutritious, grab-and-go, drive-through or walk-up breakfast & lunch while our schools are closed.
Weekdays, 10am-1pm at specific designated locations.
Registration is not required. No ID or paperwork required. Children do not need to be a CVSD student to participate. Children must be present to pick up.
